remarks.p: Initial publication committed to BloSS@M source code repository.

description.p: The organization that prepared this SSP. If developed in-house, this is the CSP itself.
The organization that prepared this SSP. If developed in-house, this is the CSP itself.
The organization for which this SSP was prepared. Typically the CSP.
The individual or individuals accountable for the accuracy of this SSP.
The individual within the CSP who is ultimately accountable for everything related to this system.
The individual or individuals who must grant this system an authorization to operate.
The individual representing the authorizing official.

role.title: Information System Management Point of Contact (POC)

description.p: The highest level manager who responsible for system operation on behalf of the System Owner.

role.title: Information System Technical Point of Contact

description.p: The individual or individuals leading the technical operation of the system.
A general point of contact for the system, designated by the system owner.

role.title: System Information System Security Officer (or Equivalent)

description.p: The individual accountable for the security posture of the system on behalf of the system owner.
The individual responsible for the privacy threshold analysis and if necessary the privacy impact assessment.

role.title: Owner of an inventory item within the system.
Administrative responsibility an inventory item within the system.

description.p: The point of contact for an interconnection on behalf of this system.

remarks.p: Remove this role if there are no ICAs.

description.p: The point of contact for an interconnection on behalf of this external system to which this system connects.

remarks.p: Remove this role if there are no ICAs.

description.p: Responsible for signing an interconnection security agreement on behalf of this system.

remarks.p: Remove this role if there are no ICAs.

description.p: Responsible for signing an interconnection security agreement on behalf of the external system to which this system connects.

remarks.p: Remove this role if there are no ICAs.

description.p: Any consultants involved with developing or maintaining this content.
Represents any customers of this system as may be necessary for assigning customer responsibility.
